constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 163 (Friday, October 14, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 9185.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H8396]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

title: Improving Reentry for District of Columbia Residents in the Bureau of Prisons Act of 2022
